short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Button Delete Twitter specifically for Elon Musk

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
One of the biggest social networks is now under private ownership, controlled by none other than Elon Musk. Although some believe he has the power to delete Twitter at will, the truth is he doesn't have a "Delete Twitter" button.

But don't worry, we've got you covered. Introducing our new extension, now available on the Google Web Store! With just a click of a button, you can easily delete Twitter without any hassle.

No need to thank me, Elon Musk!
